moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accident
    Our law firm represents victims of Florida car accident claims. If you were injured in a car accident in Florida, call us for a free consultation as soon as possible to find out about important rights you may have.
  • Personal Injury
    Personal injury generally refers to any injury to the person caused by the negligence of another. It falls under Florida's tort law. If you were injured in Florida as a result of an accident or negligence, call Florida attorney Jason Turchin.
  • Crime Victims Rights
    Many crimes are often preventable. We are crime victim's rights advocates and attorneys who represent many crime victims.
  • Wrongful Death
    Florida wrongful death attorney Jason Turchin has represented many families who lost loved ones due to the negligence of another. If you lost a loved one and someone else may be at fault, call Jason Turchin for a free consultation at (800) 337-7755.
  • Cruise Injuries
    If you were injured on a cruise, you may be entitled to money damages and other damages if the cruise line was negligent and contributed to your injuries.

description:
With offices located in Weston, Miami, Key West and Orlando, the Law Office of Jason Turchin represents clients who have sustained a personal injury, suffered the wrongful death of a loved one or were the victim of a crime. I am attorney Jason Turchin, and my law firm has been helping clients obtain proper and just compensation throughout southern Florida and beyond for many years.

When you contact my law firm for your free initial consultation, we will discuss your situation and case in-depth. Whether you were involved in a car accident through no fault of your own, sustained a personal injury on a cruise ship, or have suffered the wrongful death of a loved one, I will help you through this difficult time. Let me fight for your legal rights and due compensation, while you work on healing. Even if you live out of state, if you have sustained an injury or loss in Florida, I can help.

Over the course of my legal career, I have handled more than 4,500 accident and personal injury cases. This experience allows me to provide unparalled legal representation to all my clients, as I fully understand the personal injury laws and the legal system in Florida. Contact the Law Offices of Jason Turchin to learn more. Evening or weekend appointments are available upon request.
